name: Naming convention on Search Record (PeopleSoft)
description: The search record which is set with a component to permit research on it, is identified by a suffix (defined in a parameter list)
output: This report lists all the Search Record not following the naming convention.
rationale: A search record is a record or a view. In that case, they must be considered as exceptions for object type record table or record view and they must be identified by a specific naming convention.
remediation: Rename the object using the good naming convention and research all the references to this object using the old reference (function find reference and find in in the application designer)

qualityStandards.name: Inconsistent Naming Conventions for Identifiers
qualityStandards.description: The product's code, documentation, or other artifacts do not consistently use the same naming conventions for variables, callables, groups of related callables, I/O capabilities, data types, file names, or similar types of elements.
